animeTitle: One Piece: Episode of East Blue
otherNames: ワンピース エピソードオブ東の海[イーストブルー] ~ルフィと4人の仲間の大冒険~, One Piece: Episode of East Blue - Luffy and His Four Crewmates' Great Adventure
synopsis: Luffy and His 4 Crewmates' Big Adventure is a TV Special of the One Piece anime. It is an abridged retelling of the entire East Blue Saga, and will also animate several cover pages.
